doc.previous: Today, the German Army has five active divisions:
doc.after: 1. Panzerdivision includes the main part of the rapid reaction forces. The DSO is specialized in airborne and commando operations, the DLO covers army aviation, airmobile forces and combat support troops. 10. Panzerdivision and 13. Panzergrenadierdivision are planned for peace keeping missions. Each division is structured as two brigades and divisional troops.
